favourite.article: Great hymn! I was thinking about the truths I believe about my Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ, the song came into my mind. I was not sure of the complete lyric and went to the net to find it. Shall appreciate if I have the sol fa notation of the song. Great hymn. Thank you.

This hymn has been my praise song for over 50 years, and it will be sung at my memorial service! It testifies to the power Scripture truth set to music. It belongs in every Christian hymnal and sung by every choir!
The first and last verses are great - but you have "children of man" - I learned it "Children of God, oh, glorious calling" - which is biblically correct. Perhaps you will want to change it.

What a beautiful, spiritual hymn! Our Bible Class pastor Dr. Jim Bailiff here at Bay Village introduced it to us today. We'll study it to sing next week on Weds. at Bible class. Thank you so much. Both the message and music are so beautiful! THANK YOU.
Great song. Illustrates the liberation of the Gospel.
